About Me

I’m Vlad and I love building things. Originally from Kazakhstan, I moved to the US when I was sixteen and it’s been a crazy ride since then! I’m passionate about data and how we can leverage data to change the world for the better.

Aside from spending time on debugging my code, I enjoy exploring new taco places in SF, playing and watching soccer, and hiking in the beautiful Presidio. If you want to get in touch, connect with me on LinkedIn or shoot me a note at vbulvakhter@gmail.com.
